title: Scotland's 'most boring town' Alloa was once the 'beating heart of the Central Belt'
description: Alloa, in Clackmannanshire, prospered during the Industrial Revolution and enjoyed a golden age from the late 18th century to the early 20th century.
content:
A Scottish town once branded one of the nation's "most depressing" and "most boring" places to live was in the past the "beating heart of the Central Belt".

title: Egyptian activist arrives in UK after travel ban lifted
description: For Alaa Abdel Fattah and his family this is a new beginning after years of separation and suffering.
content:
The British-Egyptian writer and pro-democracy activist Alaa Abdel Fattah has arrived in the UK after a travel ban imposed by the Egyptian authorities was lifted.
He was freed from jail in September after spending more than a decade of his life behind... [1319 chars]

title: 'Royal trips to woo Trump' and 'Gap year soldiers'
description: Apparent plans for a royal visit to the US in the new year and a new Army recruitment scheme lead Saturday's papers.
